items.sentence: It took three hours for us to paint the fence.
It was hard for me to convince Tom to do that.
I want to get out of here as soon as possible.
I went there early so I could get a good seat.
I think you know what\'s going to happen next.
I think you\'re the only one who believes Tom.
I think about you every time I brush my teeth.
My parents have been married for thirty years.
My uncle was involved in the traffic accident.
New York City is known for its tall buildings.
Tom thought he\'d have all the time he needed.
Don\'t waste your allowance on useless things.
Don\'t worry. The ambulance will be here soon.
When I got there, there was no more cake left.
When I grow up, I want to be a French teacher.
When was the last time I told you I loved you?
It\'s been suggested that we need to help Tom.
It\'s been three years since Tom was murdered.
It\'s cheaper if you order these by the dozen.
It\'s difficult to grow anything in this soil.
